Stop Bane from rescuing Poison Ivy at the Batcave! Batman and Robin are holding Poison Ivy at the Batcave. Bane has broken into the Batcave in his awesome spinning drill tank and is trying to rescue Poison Ivy. Help Batman and Robin put Bane back behind bars where he belongs. Includes five minifigures: Bruce Wayne, Batman, Robin, Poison Ivy and Bane
  • Includes five minifigures: Bruce Wayne, Batman, Robin, Poison Ivy and Bane
  • Features Bane’s drill tank, the Batcycle, handcuffs, binoculars and two weapons
  • Batcave features an elevator function that transforms Bruce Wayne into Batman, a holding cell, four flick missiles, a computer with screens, a chair, handcuffs, binoculars and two Batarangs
  • Transform Bruce Wayne into Batman in the elevator
  • Batcycle features dual-flick missiles
  • Bane’s drill tank features a spinning drill and dual-flick missiles
  • Includes a comic book
  • Batcave measures over 8" tall
  • Bane’s drill tank measures over 4" long
  • Batcycle measures over 4" long
Features
Stop Bane’s break-in
The five included minifigures will let you act out Bruce Wayne’s transformation into Batman and his fight with Robin against Bane and Poison Ivy.
Battle in the Batcave
The Batcave is Batman’s secret fortress and comes with an elevator function to change Bruce to Batman, a holding cell, four flick missiles, a computer with screens and more.
Bane’s spinning drill tank
Bane’s brute force break-in strategy was simple: use a giant spinning drill to bust down the Batcave’s wall so he can free Poison Ivy. His tank measures over 4" long.
Build your own Batcycle
Batman can battle Bane’s spinning drill tank with his crafty Batcycle, which comes equipped with dual-flick missile launchers for long-distance crime fighting and measures over 4" long.

Product Description

CHOKING HAZARD - Small parts. Not for children under 3 yrs.

Stop Bane from rescuing Poison Ivy at the LEGO Super Heroes The Batcave (6860)! Batman and Robin are holding Poison Ivy at the Batcave. But look out! Bane has broken into the Batcave in his awesome spinning drill tank and is trying to rescue Poison Ivy. Help Batman and Robin put Bane back behind bars where he belongs!

The LEGO Super Heroes The Batcave (6860) buildable playset features:
  • 5 MiniFigures: Bruce Wayne, Batman, Robin, Poison Ivy and Bane
  • Batcave, Bane's drill tank, Batcycle, handcuffs, binoculars and 2 weapons
  • Batcave features elevator function that transforms Bruce Wayne into Batman, holding cell, 4 flick missiles, computer with screens, chair, handcuffs, binoculars and 2 batarangs
  • Batcycle features dual flick missiles
  • Bane's drill tank features spinning drill and dual flick missiles
  • Includes comic book
  • Batcave measures over 8" (21cm) tall
  • Bane's drill tank measures over 4" (12cm) long
  • Batcycle measures over 4" (11cm) long

Features

  • Contains 689 pieces.

Additional Info

How to Get It


  • This item can be shipped to the entire United States including Alaska, Hawaii, and all U.S. territories including Puerto Rico
  • This item can also be shipped to APO/FPO addresses and to P.O. Boxes in all 50 states


  • This item may be shipped via Standard Shipping, Expedited Shipping or Express Shipping
  • Please Note: Some addresses are eligible for Standard Shipping only (APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes, U.S. Territories and Puerto Rico)

(learn more):


  • Please wait for the Ready for Pickup e-mail before proceeding to the store; orders must be picked up within 5 Days upon the receipt of this email
  • You will have the option to designate someone else to pick up your order during the checkout process
  • You will be able to change the Store Pickup location during the checkout process
  • In-stock status is approximate and may not reflect recent sales
  • Orders placed for Store Pickup will receive online pricing and promotions

Rate and Review

Most Helpful Positive Review

 

The Greatest Set in the 2012 Wave!

This set is so amazing. Before I can say anymore I would like to get to the details. Minifigures: Batman (Blue) - This Batman minifgure is pretty cool and classic. I believe...Read complete review

This set is so amazing. Before I can say anymore I would like to get to the details. Minifigures: Batman (Blue) - This Batman minifgure is pretty cool and classic. I believe this is the Adam West version of batman from the 60s or 50s. Overall he is a awesome minifigure but you can get him in 2 other cheaper sets in the 2012 wave. Robin - I think the new Robin figure is an improvement from the 2006 one. He has a red and black suit. (which resembles Dick from the 90s Batman movies) He looks a lot more tougher and less wimpy in this form. But he is a awesome minifgure! Bruce Wayne - This figure is exclusive to this set! I think they did a nice job on the face. The torso printing is fancy and the hair fits him nice. The minifgure overall is a huge improvement from the 2006 Bruce Wayne. Poison Ivy - The Poison Ivy minifigue is very detailed! Her hair piece is unique and contains green vines in her red hair. She is a huge improvement from the 2006 one too! Overall this minifgure is a great addition to your batman collection! Bane - This minifigure is very classic like. It is the 1997 Batman and Robin Bane (also known as Jeep Swenson Bane). The Bane minifgure has huge abs on his torso and a nice classic head print. The minifgure is super awesome! Vehicles: Batcycle II - This bat cycle is very cool and a nice mini build! It goes well with Batman's colors and is just a cool addition to the set! Bane's Drill - Bane's Drill is also a awesome feature to the set. It's not that small but it fits Bane well. The drill spins when you move the tracks/tires. I think the Drill is pretty awesome! Main Builds: Poison Ivy's Cell - The cell is a awesome feature too. It includes cool stickers with details about Poison Ivy. There is flick missiles on the top of the cell and it can connect to the Batcave! The Batcave - Wow. I have to give a bravo to Lego cause the Batcave was amazing. The 2006 Batcave was amazing too and I never thought they could do as good. Well, I was wrong. This Batcave may be smaller, but it is very detailed! On the left side bottom of the bat cave are some black ladders to lead you up to the second flow. There is a door that slides open so Batman's Batcycle can go outside and fight some crime. And a lot of people have been wondering about this. Does the Batmobile fit through the sliding doors? The answer is yes! The Batmobile isn't in the set but it is in the Two Face Chase set. The 2nd floor of the bat cave on the left side is a place were Batman can watch crime. I think they did a very detailed part on this part. It includes a moving chair and a coffee mug. There are 3 screens with detail on whats going on in Gotham. In the middle of the Batcave there is a catwalk connecting both sides. There is a bat under the little walkway and you can easily split it apart. On the right side of the cave is a absolutely amazing feature. There first is a wall which says "Bat - Gear" and contains two batarangs and police cuffs. On top of the gear is a telephone with a place were Bruce Wayne stands. There is a pin in the back and when you pull it, Bruce Wayne turns into Batman and Batman lands onto the bottom of the right side of the Batcave. I think that feature is awesome but you can make anyone change. Like, you could get the 2008 Robin and make him change into the 2012 Robin in this set. So that feature is awesome! The Batcave rules! So overall this Set is SO worth your money. You get a huge Batcave with awesome features and awesome minifgures. Plus some vehicles! The piece price is pretty good and this is a MUST BUY for all Batman fans! And just ordinary Lego fans! I love the set so much so if your looking for a cool set for stop-motions, playing, displaying, this is your set! 10/10

VS

Most Helpful Critical Review

 

Way over priced again!!

Once again Toys R Us is selling things for a whopping 30% more than other major retailers. This is a kids store for goodness sakes!! Kids are expensive to maintain as it is! ...Read complete review

Once again Toys R Us is selling things for a whopping 30% more than other major retailers. This is a kids store for goodness sakes!! Kids are expensive to maintain as it is! We do not need a greedy toy store to add to the expense!
Shame on you!! BUYERS BEWARE!! Skip on over to the next big retailer and purchase this product for a fairer price!!

    5.0

    Our grandson loved it

    By Grandmaman

    from Saco Maine

    Comments about LEGO Super Heroes The Batcave (6860):

    This was a birthday present for our six year-old grandson. Although the product was listed for ages 8-14 he got right to it, and worked enjoyably on it until bath time and bed. First thing the next morning he was back at it, building all of the vehicles by following the clear instructions. He loves to put the things together as shown in the instructions and then play with them. Later he makes his own toys from them. Legos are expensive, but hold years of enjoyment.

                    By TimmySterkel

                    from Stevenson Ranch

                    Comments about LEGO Super Heroes The Batcave (6860):

                    Although i would defiantly prefer the old bat cave this one is pretty cool. the best part in this set is ether the display screen or banes truck. all in all this set is really cool and i would recommend picking this up before its gone.

                    Bottom Line Yes, I would recommend this to a friend
